biotools.summary: LICHeE (Lineage Inference for Cancer Heterogeneity and Evolution) is a novel method that automates the phylogenetic inference of cancer progression from multiple somatic samples.

bioschemas.summary: LICHeE (Lineage Inference for Cancer Heterogeneity and Evolution) is a novel method that automates the phylogenetic inference of cancer progression from multiple somatic samples.
